name: Coconut Fish Curry
author: Victoria Teasdale
summary: Lightly spicy, this is a wonderful creamy fish curry. Try with whatever white fish you like. Serve with brown rice.
ingredients: 3 ½ ounces cod, cut into bite-size pieces
directions: Combine curry powder, ground ginger, and ground turmeric in a skillet; toast the spices over medium heat until browned, about 5 minutes
Pour olive oil and garlic into the spice mixture and stir to make a paste
Stir onion into the spice mixture; cook and stir until the onion is tender, 5 to 7 minutes
Stir about half the coconut milk and half the water into the onion mixture; simmer together for 5 minutes
Add cod to the mixture; continue cooking until the fish is firm, about 5 minutes
Add tomato, remaining coconut milk, and remaining water to the skillet; cook until the tomato is softened, about 5 minutes
